references.paper_title: Approximate Bayesian computation in population genetics
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of Approximate Bayesian Computation (ABC), a class of methods that this paper builds upon.
This review paper provides an overview of simulation-based inference (SBI) methods, which are central to the topic of this paper.

references.paper_title: Fast &-free inference of simulation models with Bayesian conditional density estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the Sequential Neural Posterior Estimation (SNPE) method, which is a key building block for the method presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Automatic posterior transformation for likelihood-free inference
references.reason: This paper introduces the Automatic Posterior Transformation (APT) method, which is used in this paper to improve the efficiency of the SNPE method.

references.paper_title: Flexible statistical inference for mechanistic models of neural dynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces a flexible neural network-based method for approximating probability density functions, which is used in this paper to estimate the posterior distribution.
